_aChangeLog.text: Extended the corridors with more visual variety.
Added Built Cubemaps and Color Correction.
Added map Overview and Radar (slightly broken).

_sText:
Baghdad, Iraq

In-response to the Iraqi Government's support of the American-led intervention in the Middle-East, the LEET CREW Initiates an attack on the newly rebuilt Ministry of Foreign Affairs building in Baghdad, Holding 3 US Officials Hostage.

A team of SEAL TEAM 6 Operatos arrive at the scene just 20 Minutes after the incident was reported all over the local media.


cs_ministry is a Hostage Rescue map based off of PowerThrust's cs_officerescue.

Features:
  • HDR w/Built Cubemaps and Color Correction
  • 32 Players support
  • Overview and Radar (slightly broken)
  • Auto-generated BOT Navigation

Notes:
- Disable Sniper Rifles when playing with CPU Players to avoid headaches.
- The current navigation file is not Hand-tuned.

Feedback & Suggestions are always welcome. Enjoy!
